creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: applique overall with embroidery details; border has repeating panels of two figures in purple flanking a white tree; floral designs at corners; central panel has figures and soldiers with guns, bows and arrows, and swords, animals including elephants and horses, and a carriage in LLC
title: Kunduri Cloth
